body.name: babyGap Classic Stroller - Lightweight Stroller with Recline, Extendable Sun Visors & Compact Fold - Made with Sustainable Materials, Pink Stripes

features: SMOOTHEST RIDE: Swivel front wheels feature precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push--glide, turn and maneuver any surface | Locking back brakes | Puncture-proof 6-inch tires are durable and shock absorbing

SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS: All soft surfaces/fabrics on the stroller are made from recycled water bottles | Plastic drinking bottles are sorted, cleaned and shredded into flakes that become the yarn the seat fabric is made from

UNIQUELY GAP BABY: Easily recognized Baby Gap logos and iconic Brannan Bear icons create an elevated look | Stroller features 3 recline positions | Oversized canopy with extendable sun visor | Ergonomic leatherette handles

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT: Stroller only weighs 14.5 lbs. | Compact umbrella fold, auto lock and carry handle makes stroller easy to transport | Assembled dimesons: 20.7”W x 31.50”D x 42.9”H | Folded dimensions: 12”W x 44”D x 11”H
TONS OF STOAGE: Stroller features extra-large storage basket and removable parent organizer | JPMA Certified | 5-point safety harness | Recommended for ages 9 months up to 50 lbs.
body.description: Introducing the babyGap Classic Stroller: The most responsibly made lightweight stroller. Designed for the future in every possible way, all the soft fabrics on the stroller are made from recycled water bottles. Plastic drinking bottles are sorted, cleaned and shredded into flakes that become the yarn the seat fabric is made from. A great choice for your child and the planet, this everyday stroller is outfitted with front wheels that features precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push, making it easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface. Incredibly cozy, the stroller has an extra-large extendable canopy with sun visor, reclining seat and tons of storage. The extra-large storage basket and removable parent organizer ensure there’s always enough room for all your baby’s on-the-go essentials. Ideal for travel or everyday use, the stroller’s durable steel frame only weighs 14.5 pounds and the compact fold, auto lock and carry handle make it easy to transport. Uniquely babyGap, the stroller has the easily recognized babyGap logo and iconic Brannan Bear on the wheels, canopy, calf rest, parent organizer and safety harness for an elevated look. This stroller is recommended for infants 9 months up to 50 pounds.Gap’s first-ever baby gear collection reimagines timeless American style for modern families. Discover quality designs and go-to essentials that instantly refresh your routine. Think super-functional strollers and wagons, elevated patterns, sustainable materials, and more inspired finds for daily life with your little one.

productInformation.value: #7,082 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #17 in Lightweight Baby Strollers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller!
reviews.reviewText: It’s cute, easy to assemble, and sturdy. Easy to fold and unfold. Smooth pushing and maneuvering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 year old approved
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for a Disney/Universal trip. My 5 year old granddaughter was very specific about having a pink stroller. She loved it. I do wish it had more storage at the bottom, but for being so compact for its size, I understand. I wish I had purchased a gate check stroller bag as it is a really nice stroller. It did get a bit dirty on the return flight.Pros:- Folds up nicely like a small umbrella stroller and has a handle.- The stroller organizer bag is a plus. We already had one, but we used both for storing smaller items.- small enough to get around crowds- it was simple to open and close. It was tricky to figure out the closing in a hurry, but I got it down after a few tries. I felt silly for not realizing I just needed to push down on the middle paddle and push up on the right one just using my foot. I skipped the instructions for how to use it.-fit perfectly in the back of the rental minivan, Voyager, without having to fold it down.Cons:- not really a con, but wish it was made a tad bigger for bigger kids with something that they can rest their legs/feet on. We had park days where my granddaughter fell asleep in the stroller at the end of the night, but her feet would drag almost losing a Croc, but we managed. It was easier to get her from the park exit to the vehicle in a stroller as she slept or was too tired to walk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and girly
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old loved the stroller when I sat her down she didn’t want to get out of it. I love the caddy that comes with it if ur going on a quick walk or errand fits 2/3 diapers wipes and 2 bottles… quality feels great and also very very lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for bigger toddler/kids
reviews.reviewText: The stroller was very lightweight and aesthetically pleasing especially in the blue color. Loved the parent console. This stroller is great for infants but not meant for toddlers over 36 inches and more than 27lbs (which they state is good for up to 50lbs). The black straps though adjustable are just not long enough for bigger toddler/kids. The crotch strap is very short even when trying to adjust and my child complained instantly when trying to buckle him in. Also his foot would dangle and hit the wheels when he fell asleep. I really wanted to love the product unfortunately because it didn't fit my needs and expectations I had to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, easy to use, comfortable for baby
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to use, sturdy and folds to fit in car like a true umbrella stroller. There is a storage area for mom’s drink, phone etc.near the handles, and the storage area under the seat is easily accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maneuvers well and very cute
reviews.reviewText: This stroller held up great on a trip to Florida. Bumpy ride on bumpy board walks and uneven streets but smooth otherwise. Was easy to fold once I got the gist of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, sturdy and comfortable padding
reviews.reviewText: It was really easy to put together, honestly it was just the wheels. I got heather gray and it looks beautiful, comfortable padding for my baby girl who is 11 months old. We wanted a stroller light weight for our Disney trip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice stroller but harness is to tight
reviews.reviewText: I overall really liked the stroller. However, it is advertised as being for toddlers up to 50 pounds. The harness straps are too short and couldn't fit around my 25 pound baby while she was wearing her coat. Sadly, I am returning it.
